lead_paragraph: PANES--Jack S. Died peacefully on March 20, 2016. Served in WWII. Awarded Silver and Bronze Stars for combat valor in Patton's Third Army. Founder of Panes Publications, publishing house for over fifty years. Known and loved for his unmatchable sense of humor, charm, grace and kindness. Beloved husband of Pearl, wife of 66 years; father of Stephanie and Michael; grandfather of Max and Harrison. Services Wednesday 11:15am at "The Riverside," 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PANES, JACK S
